channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 09:21 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
item.description: 游댮 09:21 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 09:19 Air alarm to Donetsk Region follow the following messages.

item.title: 游리 08:15 Failure to the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-mirorskaya territorial community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 08:15 Failure to the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-mirorskaya territorial community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
